title: "Apple patent involves improved ‘computer vision’ for the iPad"
excerpt: "Apple has been granted a patent (number 11468275 B1) for “computer vision using a prior probability distribution selected based on an image capture condition.” It’s for improving the iPad’s ability to scan and capture images."
